text: thæ̂cring phwk th̀ān s̄ms̄ū̀ phwk p̄hū̂chāy læa pl̂n bn thāngh̄lwng kranận h̄rụ̄x læa krathả xnācār nı thī̀ chumchn k̄hxng phwk th̀ān tæ̀ khả txb k̄hxng h̄mū̀ chn k̄hxng k̄heā michı̀ xụ̄̀n dı nxkcāk kl̀āw ẁā cng nả kār lngthos̄ʹ k̄hx ngxạllxḥˌ mā h̄ı̂ kæ̀ phwk reā si h̄āk th̀ān xyū̀ nı h̄mū̀ p̄hū̂ s̄ạty̒ cring
